product_name: Lonely Planet Guides The Travel Book: A Journey Through Every Country in the World - 2nd Edition
long_description: The updated edition of. Author: Lonely Planet staff. Softcover, 447 pages, color photos. Lonely Planet Publications Pty. Ltd.; copyright 2011. . A great book for those who travel or dream of exploring far-off lands; an excellent gift for the young mind just awakening to the world. Dazzling, full-color photographs and explorer-friendly text describe every country equally well, playing no favorites, sparing no excitement. Small maps locate every country among its neighbors. Measures 12 x 9 inches; bookmark cover flaps lend a hardcover book's appeal.
short_description: The updated edition of The Travel Book: A Journey Through Every Country in the World profiles every country in the world with beautiful, full-color photographs and complete facts.
